reports.title: Raw SHACL/RDF
Violations by Shape Type
reports.query:
call n10s.validation.shacl.validate() yield focusNode, nodeType, shapeId, propertyShape, offendingValue, resultPath, severity, resultMessage
return  n10s.rdf.getIRILocalName(propertyShape) as violationType, count(focusNode) as count

reports.title: Selection
reports.query:
match (n) 
where id(n) = toInteger($neodash_nid)
optional match p = (n)--()
return n, p limit 100

reports.title: Constraint Violation Details
